articles.title: `Indian batters were scared of me but Sachin..`: Shoaib Akhtar makes a BIG statement ahead of IND vs PAK As... - Zee News
articles.description: It is a fact that India and Pakistan do not play each other quite often these days due to the ever-growing political tension between the two countries. The last bilateral series that took place between India and Pakistan was way back in 2012.
